name: Telekinesis
effect: Never Fail. All attacks against the target have "Never Fail". The target is immune to Ground Moves and is unaffected by Terrain and Hazard moves (such as Spikes and Sticky Web) except for Stealth Rock. Lasts 2 Rounds.
description: The user can manipulate objects and creatures with his mind. Pokemon and humans become easier to hit because their movements are restrained.
